short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily download images from Flickr with just a few clicks, saving them directly to your device.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily download photos in multiple resolutions from Flickr. With just a few clicks, you can save images in the desired quality directly to your device, bypassing unnecessary menus and steps.
